name: Duck Business
description:
Untitled Game Jam #37 submission by Augustin Janvier.

You just launched a duck breeding in a small forest and try to make as much money as you can with it !

  • Discover 8 different types of duck
  • Change your ducks into golden ducks and magical ducks
  • Watch your business grow, and your ducks walk in your ranch
  • Get more and more money

Music and sounds by Cade Conkle.

Game by Augustin Janvier.
